mapper.select: SELECT s.sid AS "studentId", s.sname AS "studentName", sc.cid AS "courseId", c.cname AS "courseName", sc.score AS "score", t.tname AS "teacherName" FROM student s INNER JOIN student_course sc ON s.sid=sc.sid INNER JOIN course c ON c.cid=sc.cid INNER JOIN teacher t ON c.tid=t.tid WHERE s.sid=#{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
